sentences.sentence: I oppose it! Even I think this kind of action is very flimflam!
sentences.translation: 反对！甚至觉得这种行为极为荒唐与不沦！

sentences.sentence: There is long groan with clutching wrist. Sigh the flimflam . You have become a trousseau!
sentences.translation: 徒留扼腕长叹，叹荒唐，你为他人做了嫁衣裳！

sentences.sentence: Merry notes that it is the record, not rhetorical flimflam, that will count when voters assess Obama.
sentences.translation: 玛丽写道，当投票人评价奥巴马时，是实实在在的记录，而非华而不实的胡说八道才是真正具有意义的。
